name: Kezan's Unstoppable Taint
tooltip:
Kezan's Unstoppable TaintLevel 60

Call forth your demons, <class>. Let them bask in the energy of Kezan's Taint. Command them on the field of battle! Decimate the enemy!

Yes... The time has come to apply the final enhancement to Kezan's Taint. Give me the talisman.

Requirements:
- Kezan's Taint
